name: Roll-A-Ball (MarshallMedia)
description:
This is my first complete game. This game is a result of the Roll-A-Ball tutorial outlined by an awesome youtuber by the name of BMO who simplified the broken rollaball tutorial on unitylearn. 

You can see his tutorial here. 

I cannot recommend that you subscribe to him enough as he has a few simple and easy tutorials for core components when working with unity that are short and to the point. This man is a king. 

Also, big thanks to the user named vandaar on the unity forums who helped me with the player movement script. If you would like to see the player movement script for this game, just shoot me a message.
